item.title: Qitmeer Node Monitoring & Maintaining
item.description: Qitmeer Node Monitoring & Maintaining Table of Contents Checking Node Connectivity Check if the P2P port and RPC port are open Check peer connection status Reload peer connections Check Node Synchronisation and Data Consistency BlockDAG Status Check EVM Status Check Checking and handling tx pending situations 1. Checking Node Connectivity To ensure that nodes can participate properly in the network, provide transaction broadcast services, etc.
